description: Configuration for Git worktree management tool

worktreeCopyPatterns.description: File patterns to copy to new worktrees (glob patterns supported)

worktreeCopyIgnores.description: File patterns to ignore when copying (glob patterns supported)

worktreePathTemplate.description: Template for worktree directory names. Variables: $BASE_PATH, $WORKTREE_PATH, $BRANCH_NAME, $SOURCE_BRANCH

postCreateCmd.description: Commands to run after creating a worktree. Variables: $BASE_PATH, $WORKTREE_PATH, $BRANCH_NAME, $SOURCE_BRANCH

terminalCommand.description: Command to open terminal in new worktree directory (e.g., 'code $WORKTREE_PATH')

deleteBranchWithWorktree.description: Also delete the associated git branch when deleting a worktree

showRemoteBranches.description: Show remote-only branches in the source branch picker
